name: Shishira (Late Winter)
tips: Drink warm water throughout the day to maintain Agni.
Include ginger, garlic, and pippali in every meal.
Perform Abhyanga (oil massage) with warm sesame oil daily.
Avoid cold, dry, and light foods that increase Vata.
lifestyle_tips: Exposure to sunlight for at least 20 minutes.
Wear warm, layered clothing made of wool or silk.
Practice vigorous exercise to keep the body warm.

name: Vasanta (Spring)
tips: Wake up early and perform exercise to reduce accumulated Kapha.
Avoid heavy, oily, and sweet foods like dairy or cold drinks.
Consume bitter and astringent tastes to dry up excess moisture.
Sip warm water with a dash of honey.
lifestyle_tips: Practice Nasya (nasal drops) to clear sinuses.
Walking in nature as the earth awakens.
Nadi Shodhana Pranayama for mental clarity.

name: Grishma (Summer)
tips: Stay hydrated with natural coolants like rose water or coconut water.
Avoid spicy, sour, and salty foods that increase internal heat.
Take a short nap in the afternoon to preserve energy.
Favor sweet, cold, and liquid foods.
lifestyle_tips: Walk in the moonlight or near water bodies.
Apply sandalwood paste for its cooling effect.

name: Varsha (Monsoon)
tips: Drink only boiled and filtered water.
Eat light, fresh, and warm food as digestion is weakest now.
Keep your feet dry and clean to avoid fungal issues.
Include a small amount of honey in your diet.
lifestyle_tips: Keep surroundings dry and use incense to purify the air.
Gentle stretching rather than heavy exercise.

name: Sharad (Autumn)
tips: Enjoy the moonlight; it is particularly healing this season.
Eat sweet, bitter, and astringent foods to calm Pitta.
Avoid excessive sunlight exposure during mid-day.
Cleanse the blood with cooling herbs like Manjistha.
lifestyle_tips: Practice Pitta-pacifying yoga like Sheetali Pranayama.
Wear light colors like white or soft blue.

name: Hemanta (Early Winter)
tips: The appetite is strongest now; eat nourishing, heavy foods.
Consume sweet, sour, and salty tastes to balance Vata.
Keep your head and ears covered when outdoors.
Perform daily self-massage with oil before bathing.
lifestyle_tips: Enjoy the warmth of a fire or sauna.
Maintain a regular routine for eating and sleeping.
Weight training and heavy exercise are most beneficial now.
